title: Antigravity vs Chainlit: Which developer tools Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Chainlit. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Chainlit? Both are popular developer tools tools, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Chainlit
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2026 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Chainlit (developer tools) is Chainlit is an open-source Python framework specifically designed for building and deploying conversational AI applications with rich, interactive interfaces. It enables developers to quickly create chat-based UIs for Large Language Model (LLM) applications, offering built-in features like real-time streaming, file uploads, and custom UI elements. Its unique value lies in being a developer-centric, production-ready toolkit that bridges the gap between LLM backends and polished front-end experiences, significantly speeding up the prototyping and deployment of chatbot and agent-based applications.. Users choose it for python-framework, chat-application, llm-frontend.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

Chainlit: Drag-and-drop file upload & processing for images, PDFs, TXT, etc., Real-time streaming of LLM responses with a built-in interface, Customizable UI elements (buttons, sliders, expandable elements) within the chat

verdict: Both Antigravity and Chainlit are excellent AI tools. For developer tools, your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Chainlit for python-framework.
